**Is it permissible if joss paper has strong resemblance to Vietnamese money?
How much are the fines for making joss paper that imitates Vietnamese money?
My family is selling joss paper currently. We have an idea of making joss
paper that imitates Vietnamese money in order to attract customers. However,
we don't know whether it is permissible? Looking forward to your consultancy.
Thank you. **

## Is it permissible if joss paper strongly imitates Vietnamese money?

As prescribed in Article 3 of Decision 130/2003/QD-TTg, the following acts are
strictly prohibited:

1\. Producing, transporting, storing, circulating, selling or buying
counterfeit money.

2\. Ruining Vietnamese money in any form.

3\. Duplicating Vietnamese money for any purposes without written consents of
the State Bank.

4\. Refusing to receive and/or circulate money issued by the State Bank within
the Vietnamese territory.

Persuant to current regulations, the law prohibits imitating Vietnamese money
under any circumstances without prior written consent of the State bank of
Vietnam. For that reason, if you do not have prior consent, your act is
considered to be illegal.

## How much are the fines for making joss paper that imitates Vietnamese
money?

According to Clause 4, Clause 5, Clause 6, Article 31 of [Decree 88/2019/ND-
CP](https://lawnet.vn/vb/nghi-dinh-88-2019-nd-cp-xu-phat-vi-pham-hanh-chinh-
trong-tien-te-va-ngan-
hang-68a7a.html?id=428666&tab=3&language=VN&News_Subject=&News_Code=&FriendlyUrl=nghi-
dinh-88-2019-nd-cp-xu-phat-vi-pham-hanh-chinh-trong-tien-te-va-ngan-
hang&LawType_ID=0&Title=Ngh%E1%BB%8B%20%C4%91%E1%BB%8Bnh%2088/2019/N%C4%90-CP%20quy%20%C4%91%E1%BB%8Bnh%20v%E1%BB%81%20x%E1%BB%AD%20ph%E1%BA%A1t%20vi%20ph%E1%BA%A1m%20h%C3%A0nh%20ch%C3%ADnh%20trong%20l%C4%A9nh%20v%E1%BB%B1c%20ti%E1%BB%81n%20t%E1%BB%87%20v%C3%A0%20ng%C3%A2n%20h%C3%A0ng)
on penalties for violations against regulations on protection of Vietnam's
cash:

4\. A fine ranging from VND 40,000,000 to VND 50,000,000 shall be imposed for
photocopying, printing or using design, a part of or all images, elements or
patterns on Vietnam's cash against law regulations.

5\. Additional penalties:

All exhibits and instrumentalities used for committing any of the
administrative violations prescribed in Clauses 2, 3 and 4 of this Article
shall be confiscated and turned over to competent authorities.

6\. Remedial measures:

a) Enforced sealing and punching of counterfeit money according to SBV's
regulations on handling of counterfeit money and suspected counterfeit money
if the violation prescribed in Point c Clause 2 of this Article is committed

b) Enforced destruction of all exhibits and instrumentalities used for
committing any of the violations prescribed in Clause 4 of this Article;

c) Enforced transfer of benefits illegally obtained from any of the violations
prescribed in Clause 4 of this Article to state budget.

According to the above regulations, a fine ranging from VND 40,000,000 to VND
50,000,000 shall be imposed for making joss paper that imitates Vietnamese
money. In addition, all exhibits and instrumentalities used for committing
shall be confiscated and destroyed. Profits obtained from committing shall be
handed over to competent authorities.
